CBD.realtime.accurate_time module¶

Custom time module to keep things platform- and Python version-independent.

CBD.realtime.accurate_time.time()[source]¶

Gets the correct system time, independent of the Python version or the platform.

CBD.realtime.accurate_time.sleep(t)[source]¶

Sleeps for a while.

Parameters

t (float) – Amount of seconds to sleep.
